name: Concepto Movil
description:
Concepto Móvil has +13 years’ experience communicating companies with their customers and among their internal teams through mobile solutions, now maximizing the impact of this through WhatsApp Business Platform (API).

We advise our customers to find the best way in which our tools can support their processes to maximize the impact of their commercial actions and help them to achieve more efficient and effective processes.

- Achieve +6 times more sales production per member of the sales team.
- Increase 30% the lead conversion because of the immediate and precise communication to field sales.
- 40% cost reduction by attending multiple conversations at the same time.
 
We have all of the necessary integrations to maximize the impact of the WhatsApp messaging platform in your business by complementing the platform with multiple channels.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Business Platform API: Conversational commerce, ChatBots, AI, Automations, Multi agent service, Omnichannel.
Integral messaging strategies: Marketing campaigns, validation codes, onboarding processes, internal process efficiency.
